text: Old Gallo-Romance is a Romance language spoken from around 600 to 900 AD. == Literature == Old Gallo-Romance literature consists of a few texts, with them including the Oaths of Strasbourg (also written in Old High Frankish).« Moyen Âge : l'affirmation des langues vulgaires » in the Encyclopædia universalis.Bernard Cerquiglini, La naissance du français, Paris, Presses universitaires de France, 1991, Que-sais-je ? ; éd. mise à jour, 2007.Conference of Claude Hagège at the historical museum of Strasbourg, , (read online) Texts that precede the Oaths of Strasbourg include the Kassel and Reichenau glosses. == References == Gallo
title: Old Gallo-Romance
